mapper.select:
SELECT p.country, p.id as id, p.phone as phone, p.retry_num as retryNum, p.phone_status as phoneStatus, p.first_enter_time as firstEnterTime, p.code as smsCode, p.create_time as createTime FROM cd_get_phone p LEFT JOIN cd_register_subtasks s ON p.subtasks_id = s.id
order by p.create_time desc

sql.if: and p.create_time between CONCAT(#{dto.createStartTime}, ' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{dto.createEndTime}, ' 23:59:59')

mapper.select: SELECT country_code as countryCode, SUM( CASE WHEN register_status = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS registerStock, SUM( CASE WHEN register_status in(4,11) AND create_time >= #{searchStartTime} AND create_time < #{searchEndTime} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS registerNum FROM cd_line_register WHERE register_status IN ( 4, 11 ) GROUP BY country_code;
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO cd_line_register (ab, app_version, country_code, phone, proxy, proxy_status, txt_token, task_id, sms_code, register_status, delete_flag, create_time, open_time, token, get_phone_id, pkey, subtasks_id, group_task_id, open_status, account_status, group_count, account_exist_status, err_msg, export_status) VALUES
(#{item.ab}, #{item.appVersion}, #{item.countryCode}, #{item.phone}, #{item.proxy}, #{item.proxyStatus}, #{item.txtToken}, #{item.taskId}, #{item.smsCode}, #{item.registerStatus}, #{item.deleteFlag}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.openTime}, #{item.token}, #{item.getPhoneId}, #{item.pkey}, #{item.subtasksId}, #{item.groupTaskId}, #{item.openStatus}, #{item.accountStatus}, #{item.groupCount}, #{item.accountExistStatus}, #{item.errMsg}, #{item.exportStatus})
